resources.string: This activity will show CardViews with all the playlists that the user has

The image from the CardView consists of more smaller images from the artists in that playlists.
An algorithm that searches the internet for the artist's pictures in a certain size would have to be implemented.
The number of CardViews per row will have to be responsive to the screen of the device or the portrait/landscape mode. 
If you press on the CardView then the SongActivity will start with all the songs from that playlist.
This activity will show CardViews with all the artists from the songs

An algorithm that searches the internet for the artist\'s pictures in a certain size would have to be implemented.\nThe number of CardViews per row will have to be responsive to the screen of the device or the portrait/landscape mode.\nIf you press on the CardView, then the SongActivity will start with all the songs from that artist.
This activity will show CardViews with all the albums from the songs

An algorithm that searches the internet for pictures of the albums in a certain size would have to be implemented.\nThe number of CardViews per row will have to be responsive to the screen of the device or the portrait/landscape mode. \nIf you press on the CardView, then the SongActivity will start with all the songs from that album.
This activity will show a list with all the songs that the user has. It has also a search song bar.

A search song algorithm would have to be written, in order to search for songs in the users library. Also, when the user will press play on a song in the list, then a media player with now playing will appear on the same screen.
